name: Название
attack-affected-by-buffs-to: ATTACK ROLL AFFECTED BY BUFFS TO
update-pilot-tooltip: Pull piloting ranks from the opened pilot's sheet
cargo-placeholder: Укажите здесь любой груз или пассажиров на корабле

character-info-help-first-line: В этой вкладке хранится вся основная информация о вашем персонаже. Большинство из этих полей не влияют на сам лист, за исключением двух:
character-info-help-second-line: Класс/Уровень заполняется сам на основание того, что вы ввели на вкладе "Класс".
character-info-help-third-line: ПЗ расы. Это поле используется листом для хранения значения вашего расового значения ПЗ и для общего расчета ПЗ.
class-info-help-first-line: В \той вкладке хранится вся основная информация о вашем классе (классах). Все поля делятся на следующие столбцы:
class-info-help-second-line: Имя. Название класса. Оно вместе с уровнем связано с полем "Класс/Уровень" во вкладке "Персонаж".
class-info-help-third-line: Level: The level of this class. In addition to affecting the class/level field, this is used to calculate much of your character's info from health to skills
class-info-help-fourth-line: Пункты живучести. Как много пунктов живучести этот класс дает на каждом уровне.
class-info-help-fifth-line: Пункты здоровья. Как много пунктов здоровья этот класс даёт на каждом уровне.
class-info-help-sixth-line: Base Attack Bonus Progression: The progression of the class' BAB. 1/2 BAB classes will have a bab of 0 at level 1 and 10 at level 20. 3/4 BAB classes will have a bab of 0 at level 1 and 15 at level 20. Full BAB (or 1) will have a BAB equal to their level.
class-info-help-seventh-line: Fortitude/Reflex/Will Save Progressions: The progression of the saves. There are two progressions: Good, which starts at 2, and Poor which starts at 0.
class-info-help-eighth-line: Skills/Level: The number of skill points your class grants each level, not counting intelligence bonus
class-info-help-ninth-line: Key Ability: The class' key ability score
class-info-help-tenth-line: Галочка "Закл.". Ставится, если у класс творит заклинания.
spellclass-info-help-first-line: This section stores the details of all your spellcasting classes. A panel is created for each class that casts spells, and each panel has the following editable fields:
spellclass-info-help-second-line: Casting Ability: The ability used to cast spells.
spellclass-info-help-third-line: Spell Progression: How quickly the class gains new spell levels. Technomancer and Mystic are partial spell casters. Other progressions are included to support importing pathfinder classes.
spellclass-info-help-fourth-line: Spells/Day: There is a current and a maximum for each spell level. These are displayed as different spell levels are gained.
mods-help-first-line: This textarea is used to enter buffs, penalties, and other modifications to the sheet. Full details can be found on the sheet's wiki page, but the basic syntax is given here:
mods-help-second-line DO NOT TRANSLATE a: +X BonusType to target BonusType is optional and can be any word (letters and spaces). Target is the name of the attribute you want to modify. Underscores in the name can be replaced with spaces. You may also use the keywords attack and damage to affect all attack and damage attributes of attacks, spells, and abilities.
armor-help-third-line: Entering Armor Mods: The mods syntax can handle eac and kac bonuses, armor check penalty, and maximum dexterity bonuses:
attacher-help-first-line: This textarea is used to override the default roll template output, send api commands with the roll, or include any other chat messages you want sent at the same time as the roll. The first line of the textarea is included with the roll template, while any other lines are sent as independent chat messages.
buffs-help-first-line: The textareas in this repeating section are used to enter buffs, penalties, and other modifications to the sheet. Full details can be found on the sheet's wiki page, but the basic syntax is given here:
ac help first line: This section displays your character's armor classes and miscellaneous notes about them. Armor bonuses are handled via the mods section of the item, ability, and/or buff repeating sections below and above. You can enter armor related buffs like so:
saves help first line: This section displays your character's save bonuses and miscellaneous notes about them. The BASE column shows what bonus you receive from your class levels and is calculated by the sheet based on the information entered in the class details pane above. Any items or abilities that modify these values are handled via the mods section of the item, ability, and buff repeating sections.
health help first line: This section displays your total and current health values. The hp, sp, and rp maximums are calculated based on your stats and class levels. Any items or abilities that modify these values are handled via the mods section of the item, ability, and buff repeating sections.
attribute help first line: This section stores your ability scores and modifiers, as well as allowing handling for ability damage, penalties, and drain.
specify spell level charmancer: Это заклинание зависит от уровня. Какой уровень или уровни вы желаете добавить в ваш лист?
spell variant title: Will add the checked spells to your sheet and will clear and hide this dialog
welcome charmancer: Welcome to the Charactermancer for Starfinder!
what charmancer is: The Charactermancer is a step-by-step process that makes building a character simple and streamlined. Changes are saved as you progress, but the character sheet is only updated when the Charactermancer has been completed.
skills help first line: В этой вкладке хранятся все ваши навыки. Навыки профессий можно добавить нажатием на кнопку плюс.
add multiattack: Add some multiattacks to roll something here
mod wizard instructions: Этот помощник поможет вам добавить бонусы, штрафы от выбранных вами способностей, баффов, снаряжения и другого, чтобы те влияли на параметры вашего персонажи. Просто добавьте новую строчку, кликнув на кнопку "+". После того, как добавите все бонусы, нажмите "Добавить". Эффекты этих модификаторов не работают в листе до тех пор, пока вы не закончите с помощником.
mod wizard title: Will add the mods to your sheet and will clear and hide this dialog
wizard-buffs-help-first-line: The textareas in this repeating section display buffs & penalties that are part of each item. Click on the textarea to open the wizard. You can also switch to the manual method on the settings page.
wizard-mods-help-first-line: This textarea displays buffs & penalties that are part of each item. Click on the textarea to open the wizard. You can also switch to the manual method on the settings page.
final charactermancer step: The last step is to choose whether to overwrite any existing data on this character, or update your existing character with your choices from the mancer.
